## UseBooleanResult interface

A boolean value, and functions to update it.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface UseBooleanResult 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [off](./hooks.usebooleanresult.off.md) |  | () =&gt; void | Set the value to false. |
|  [on](./hooks.usebooleanresult.on.md) |  | () =&gt; void | Set the value to true. |
|  [toggle](./hooks.usebooleanresult.toggle.md) |  | () =&gt; void | Toggle the value. |
|  [value](./hooks.usebooleanresult.value.md) |  | boolean | Current boolean value. |
